data.message: Better be good...recovery wasnt that good man....hope you drop something that sounds.like eminem show or before

replies.message: yeah REC0VERY wasn't good,it was fucking epic biiiiiiiiitch.
You right, recovery was great.
Lolllll alright
Uh recovery was a long time ago
You're right he probably just forgot how good it was
He's 15 years older than when he released Eminem Show. No one is going to be the same after 15 years.
After relapse has ALL ben garbage i bet the new one is too
Wes Causey shut the fuck up
There's been an album since recovery..
Recovery is life boy
Homosexual comment..recovery was way too far good..marshal mathers 2 was ok..too much rock beats
You oughta listen to Walk On Water. In this song it's Eminem talking about people expecting so much of this dude and he tries to meet everybody's expectations.
Marcus Hard you stfu you aint shit fake ass wanna be rapper surely waaaay worse than em new shit.  You can pretend its good if u want idk0
Matt Daylor have ypu listened the new wu tang ??????
I think that recovery is his best album

he can't be the same mc he was before he evolves with time... like it or not time is a majour thing for artists...eminem released walk on water recently more of a message than a song for me. what people don't understand is that this man is a mere mortal like all of uss and I'm sure all this must be bringing the man stress. 
plus he has been in the game 20 years and "sales are dropping" more because of the cultural difference of today's music. 
this generation prefers catchy bass boosted tunes with stupid lyrics and lack of real rap talent,schemes...whatever .see rice gum... lil pump...,
rap is changing but thanks to this man and a chunk of others its still real.
drop the Mic or not Em you still will be a legend and your music will be played in a 100 years from now. I'm happy I lived during the prime of probably the best.
lyrically still are so its all good.
Thats why hos latest album arent that good....hes trying to make commercial rap instead of juat dropping what people wants....who cares about the sales hes the best selling hip hop artist of all time

nah he ain't,just forget about it man you don't get it.
don't wanna waste my time
Recovery.. he was in pain tho.. he is a human too. Try to understand before sth dramatic happens and u will regret it. People like u, expecting so much from him. Listen to walk on water.
fans are always expecting the impossible next thing they'll expect shady to grow wings and fly away...😕
Xcuse me men... You didn't listen to recovery then!
